Plot: A CIA special forces team are betrayed and left for dead by their superiors, galvanizing them to mount an offensive on the CIA.
Title: The Losers
Writer: Peter Berg (screenplay), James Vanderbilt (screenplay), Andy Diggle (characters)
Actors: Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Zoe Saldana, Chris Evans, Idris Elba
tomatoConsensus: The Losers is loud, fast, and unrelentingly violent -- but it's also funny and well-acted, which will make all the difference for some action fans.
